'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.
__NOTOC__
==Background==
The office and work space of a fleet master of the [[Royal Deadfire Company]].

==Points of interest==
* The back room can be unlocked with a [[Small Key]] (carried by Wakoyo) or [[Mechanics]] 12.

==Characters==
* [[Fleet Master Wakoyo]]

'''Cut characters'''
* [[Floren]]
* [[Di≈µanna]]

==Loot==
* [[Royal Deadfire Company Colors]]: In the fleet master's desk ([[Mechanics|Difficulty]] 15, or the [[Small Key]])
* {{s3}} [[Titan's Heart]]: In a chest on the right hand side of the office, during [[The Slaying Face's Hunt for the Titan's Heart]].
